text: Hey how are you doing today?
I'm great! And you?
I'm doing well thanks for asking.  How is the weather where you are at?
It's been quite hot these last few days. Disgusting heat wave. I personally love cold weather.
Yeah I do to, I can't wait for the snow to fly here :)  Just a quick question to find out a little more about you.  Have you given to any charities lately?
Yes, I have. I dontate to the Red Cross regularly.
I do as well and wish many more people would.  I like that they and a lot of other charities are utilizing the technology to make donations a lot easier.
Yes they certainly are. I always donate online now.
Good for you!  Okay have you hear about any charities lately that have been doing extra due to the wars in which civilians are unfortunately in the wrong place with little help?
No I don't think I've heard about any of those.

Let me give you an example for instance, millions of Syrian children have grown up facing the daily threat of violence. In the first two months of 2018 alone, 1,000 children were reportedly killed or injured in intensifying violence.
Wow that sounds pretty bad

Yeah a lot of people are unaware of exactly what is going on in this messed up world.  I wish the media would actually do more to help out.  This is when a charity steps in specifically Save the Children Foundation.
That would definitley be very helpfil
Today, together we can help this charity out.  Would you be willing to donate some or all of the money you would get for doing this task?
Not right now I can't
Is there anything you have purchased this week that is not a neccessity?
Not really. Just food and stuff.

Well maybe not just last week but how about all year.  What do we waste our time and money on?  I understand we all need to make money, but why can't people help out the people that truly need our help in this world.  If you donate $2.00 today I will match that.  Then we will have done our good deed for the day and maybe just maybe the universe will reward us in another way!
I don't think I've really wasted much money lately.
Okay thats fine do you still wish to donate for karma to kick in?
